name: Friend or Foe (Keratuwe)
description:
The Story

The game is inspired by human interactions, mainly relationships. There are different types of relationships:

  • Family Relationships.
  • Friendships.
  • Casual Relationships.
  • Romantic Relationships.
  • ...just to name a few.

Though they all have distinct key differences, there are also some basic foundations. The main focus for this game is support. It is always comforting to know that there is someone you can rely  on when you are emotionally drained but how much can one take before feeling taken advantage of.  At some point you have to make it through the challenge alone to win.

Game Play

 It has relatively simple game play  each level has a certain number of collectibles and each of these has a different value depending on the colour i.e red has 2 points,yellow has 4 etc. The aim is to reach the end point with  as may points as possible but not taking too much from them just as the story indicates.
